snippet: The network, which has not had much success in prime time recently, took the opportunity to celebrate the early-season success of "Revolution,'' a drama, and two comedies, "Go On'' and "The New Normal.''
abstract: The network, which has not had much success in prime time recently, took the opportunity to celebrate the early-season success of "Revolution,'' a drama, and two comedies, "Go On'' and "The New Normal.''

headline.main: NBC Quickly Renews 3 New Fall Series
